verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:10
verses.text: Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:11
verses.text: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 16:12
verses.text: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
